biotools.summary: Robust and non-parametric analysis of massively parallel reporter assays | MPRAscore: Robust and non-parametric analysis of massively parallel reporter assays (MPRA) | MPRAscore infers allele-specific effects on transcription from MPRA data. MPRAscore uses a weighted, variance-regularized method to calculate variant effect sizes robustly, and a permutation approach to test for significance without assuming normality or independence

bioschemas.name: MPRAscore
